thread.section_title: Figo Pet Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Figo Pet Insurance | figopetinsurance.com
thread.title: So glad to have Figo.
thread.title_full: Figo Pet Insurance reviewed by So glad to have Figo.

author: So glad to have Figo.
title: So glad to have Figo.
text: I was hesitant to buy pet insurance because I had read it was kind of a gamble on your money. Then my kitten died, and I didn't want to ever worry about cost again during a pet's last moments. I was determined to find the best plan. I spent hours comparing policies, but I didn't need to. Figo had the best coverage and the best price -- and no cost in life-threatening emergencies. The site is beautiful and easy and the whole experience has just been so positive. My pet is treated like family. Bafflingly good! Don't wait until tragedy strikes; just do it!
